title: SET_VEHICLE_NITRO_PTFX_RANGE
content:
0xA40CB822// SetVehicleNitroPtfxRange
void SET_VEHICLE_NITRO_PTFX_RANGE(float range);Parameters:range: The visible distance. Default is 50.0f.Sets the maximum distance in which _SET_VEHICLE_NITRO_ENABLED PTFX are rendered. Distance is measured from the camera position.
